item.description:
Join the ladies of Red Sox Natives for a night on the town. Come play party games like Likewise, Pictionary, and Apples to Apples. Word games like Bananagrams, strategy games like Dominion, and card games are also encouraged. No boys allowed. 

 

We'll meet in the back room of Uno Chicago Grill (Pizzeria Unos) on Boylston street in downtown Boston for drinks, food, conversation, and games. Our female friends from the meetups "Boston Cards & Conversations" "Girls Night Out," "Social Fun," "Girls Just Want to Have Fun," "Boston's Social Strategy (and Slightly Silly) Gamers" and "North Shore Women's Group" will also join us. (If you happen to be a member of more than one group, please only RSVP to one.) Invite your other female friends, the more the merrier. 

WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW

  • This is an open event.  Bring your favorite card or board game, along with an appetite! (Don't have games? No problem--there will be plenty there.)
  • There is no cost to attend, but we expect all members to buy food and/or drink to support our venue.   No outside food is allowed. This was the only way we could get this location for free, so we appreciate you minding this policy :)

HOW TO GET THERE

Coming by subway:

Take the Green Line to Copley or Orange Line to Back Bayand walk down Boylston Street past the library. Pizzeria Uno's is on the next block on the right-hand side.

Coming by car:

Interstate 93 (from north or south): Take Storrow Drive exit. Take Copley Square exit off of Storrow Drive. The exit deadends at a signal light. The cross street is Beacon. Take a right on Beacon Street. While on Beacon Street, you will cross Berkeley, Clarendon, and Dartmouth Streets. The next street is Exeter. Take a left onto Exeter (it is a one-way street). While on Exeter, you will cross Marlborough Street, Commonwealth Avenue, and Newbury Street. The next cross street is Boylston. Pizzeria Uno's is located on 731 Boylston St., between Exeter & Fairfield.

Mass Pike (Interstate 90): Come all the way into the city on the Mass Pike. Take the Copley Square exit (the sign will read: Prudential Center, Copley Square). The exit road will split, follow the Copley Square (right) lane. You will exit the tunnel onto Stuart Street. You will be on the right hand side of the street. Move to the lane furthest left. Take the left at the next light, Dartmouth Street (approximately 500 feet from the tunnel exit). Take a left at Boyslton Street. Pizzeria Uno's is located on 731 Boylston St., between Exeter & Fairfield.
item.name: Girlsâ€™ Game Night!
